author: clarfonthey
source:
-- HUMAN RESOURCE MACHINE PROGRAM --
-- 20-Multiplication-Workshop - SIZE 34/15 - SPEED 95/109 --

-- This solution sorts the input to reduce additions.

    JUMP     f
a:
b:
c:
d:
    COPYFROM 2
e:
    OUTBOX
f:
g:
    INBOX
    JUMPZ    k
    COPYTO   0
    INBOX
    JUMPZ    e
    COPYTO   1
    SUB      0
    JUMPN    i
    COMMENT  1
    COPYFROM 1
    COPYTO   2
    BUMPDN   0
    JUMPZ    b
h:
    COPYFROM 2
    ADD      1
    COPYTO   2
    BUMPDN   0
    JUMPZ    c
    JUMP     h
i:
    COMMENT  2
    COPYFROM 0
    COPYTO   2
    BUMPDN   1
    JUMPZ    d
j:
    COPYFROM 2
    ADD      0
    COPYTO   2
    BUMPDN   1
    JUMPZ    a
    JUMP     j
k:
    COMMENT  0
    OUTBOX
    INBOX
    JUMP     g
